dcterms:description: A two-party multi-modal conversation dataset derived from the scenarios in the scripts of the two actors. The pre-defined categorical emotions are neutral, sad, anger, happy, frustrated, excited.
dcterms:title: IEMOCAP

dcterms:creator: S. Poria
D. Hazarika
N. Majumder
G. Naik
E. Cambria
R. Mihalcea
dcterms:description: A multi-party multi-modal dataset enriched from EmotionLines dataset, collected from the scripts of American TV show Friends. The pre-defined emotions are neutral, sad, anger, disgust, fear, happy, surprise.
dcterms:title: MELD

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
H. Su
X. Shen
W. Li
Z. Cao
S. Niu
dcterms:description: A dataset compiled from human-written daily conversations with only two parties involved and no speaker information. The pre-defined emotion labels are the Ekmanâ€™s emotion types: neutral, happy, surprise, sad, anger, disgust, fear.
dcterms:title: DailyDialog
